awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: Hayley Mills plays twins who, unknown to their divorced parents, meet at a summer camp. Products of single parent households, they switch places (surprise!) so as to meet the parent they never knew, and then contrive to reunite them.
plot: Teenage twin girls swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.
title: The Parent Trap
writers: Erich Kèstner (based on the book: "Das doppelte Lottchen")
David Swift (written for the screen by)
